titles.title: A resolution authorizing the expenditures by the Committee on the Judiciary.
A resolution authorizing the expenditures by the Committee on the Judiciary.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Leahy under authority of the order of the Senate of 03/23/2013. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 34.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on the Judiciary from: (1) March 1, 2013, through September 30, 2013; (2) October 1, 2013, through September 30, 2014; and (3) October 1, 2014, through February 28, 2015.
